meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Smoking (Public Health) (Designation of No Smoking Areas) Notice

def.name: PublicTransportFacility
def.leadIn: In this Notice, public transport facility (公共運輸設施) means—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: any area that consists of the termini of 2 or more modes of public transport and is used for effecting and facilitating interchange between them; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: any bus terminus of more than one specified route as defined in section 2 of the Public Bus Services Ordinance (Cap. 230).

section.name: s3
section.heading: Designation of no smoking areas in public transport facilities
section.content: The whole of each public transport facility specified in column 1 of Part 1, 2 or 3 of the Schedule and described opposite to that facility in column 2 of that Part is designated as a no smoking area.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.heading: Designated No Smoking Areas in Public Transport Facilities
